definition: see 將功贖罪|将功赎罪[jiang1 gong1 shu2 zui4]
to desire/to invite/to request
will/shall/to use/to take/to checkmate/just a short while ago/(introduces object of main verb, used in the same way as 把[ba3])

to turn sth over/to turn upside down/to tip sth out (of a container)

to break/to fracture/to snap/to suffer loss/to bend/to twist/to turn/to change direction/convinced/to convert into (currency)/discount/rebate/tenth (in price)/classifier for theatrical scenes/to fold/accounts book

sentences.english: This time he is going to do his utmost to make amends for the failure last time.
sentences.chinese: 这次任务他格外卖力，想将功折罪以弥补上次的失败。

to confess one's fault/to accept one's punishment
to atone for a crime
mortal crime/capital offense
to render meritorious service/to make worthy contributions/to distinguish oneself
restored to one's official post/to send sb back to his former post
open the net on one side (idiom); let the caged bird fly/to give one's opponent a way out/lenient treatment
to request recognition for sb's merits/to recommend sb for promotion or an award

suffering/hardship/living hell
